data.message: Hi Facebook. I have 2 Facebook pages. One page has a Twitter screen name under the page name. The Twitter name is wrong. How do I fix it? I never added it. It just appeared on its own.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Lori. The name listed under the page name is your Facebook username. To change your username, you can follow these steps: http://bit.ly/28Q8pn7. -Brad
I don't wish to change my username, but I would like to change the @screename listed on my page.  I don't want people going to a page thinking it's me & it's not.
